Pmacct::Start (  ) 

Start module process(es).

Tries PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT times.

Returns:
boolean TRUE if the process starts
Todo:
Actually should stop retying on some error conditions?

Todo:
Check $TmpFile for error messages, if so break out instead
